parameters.subject: Pasovit Technologies - Round 1 task
parameters.html:
=

Hi {{ $json.question_jyEo8E.value }},

Thank you for your interest in the UI/UX Designer role. As the next step in our evaluation process, we’re assigning you a practical design task.

Task

Design a Hospital Website in Figma.

Expectations:

  • Create a clean, modern, professional hospital website UI
  • Include well-structured navigation and clear information hierarchy
  • Design should be responsive-friendly (desktop-first is fine)
  • Use components and proper spacing/typography (basic design system discipline)
  • Your Figma file should be organized (pages, frames, naming)

Submission Instructions (Important)

Do NOT reply to this email with files.

You must submit your Figma link through the form below:

Submission Form:
https://tally.so/r/xXDBry

Please ensure your Figma sharing settings allow access (recommended: “Anyone with the link can view”).

Deadline

The deadline is 11:59 PM (your local time) on {{ (() => { const d = new Date(Date.now()); d.setDate(d.getDate() + 4); return d.toLocaleDateString('en-GB'); })() }} .

Late or incorrectly submitted entries will not be reviewed unless prior approval is taken.

What Happens Next

Candidates who perform well on this task will be shortlisted for an interview. This task is the primary screening step, so follow the instructions precisely.

Best regards,
Team Pasovit
